articles.author: Jamie L. LaReau
articles.title: Ford to cut up to 3000 salaried jobs, a 'significant' percentage in Michigan - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: Ford Motor Co. has started to eliminate thousands of white-collar jobs this week in North America and India. The bulk of the cuts will be in Michigan.
articles.content: Over the next few days, thousands of Ford Motor Co. salaried workers will be let go, the bulk of them in Michigan, as the company trims costs and continues to reorganize and transform its business mo… [+4416 chars]

articles.description: The AMA is leading the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. See video updates on how the AMA is fighting COVID-19 by discussing adult immunizations.
articles.content:
